details: Created software solutions for routine tasks using Python, utilizing uv for project environment/version management.
Used Git and GitHub to manage project versions and communicate issues.
Worked with both open-source and closed-source libraries, with and without documentation.
Wrote in-depth documentation covering past projects.
Regularly re-imaged computers and deployed software for faculty and student machines.
Resolved customer issues and led technology-based solutions to technical problems.
Helped students work through confusion by tracing conceptual understanding using custom notes and course abstractions.
Created self-made study materials for students across multiple math subjects.
